name: Easy Imagemap
description: A REDCap external module that converts images in descriptive fields into clickable image maps.

action-tags.description: Converts images in descriptive fields into clickable image maps. Simply add the action tag to a descriptive field that has an image that is displayed inline. Once added, a button to set up the image map will appear in the Online Designer.

project-settings.name: Output debug information to the browser console
